summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3822 for the improvement of 35th Avenue South, from Norton Street to a point 200 feet south thereof; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46958, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
